name: Warlock's Citadel
description: Fight your way through dungeons littered with dangerous traps, equip your character, learn various skills and spells, defeat hordes of monsters, and save the kingdom from a threats of evil warlock.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.4GHz dual core (Intel Core i3 or better, AMD Athlon X2 or better) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2 compatible, 256 Mb RAM or better (e.g. Intel HD 4000, nVidia GTX220, ATI Mobility Radeon 4570) Storage: 100 MB available space
